title: Figure of a Hippopotamus
description:
Green faience statuette of a standing hippopotamus, frontal. Each pair of legs formed in one mass (typical of period). Large bulbous jaw. 
Condition: Front legs broken. Minor chips on head. Entire surface worn.
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Alastair B. Martin
